entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 70
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH THIS EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

PARTLY SUNNY
PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE
